Title: Verify Sprint Burndown Gadget Configuration
Description:
Ensure that the Sprint Burndown Gadget can be configured by selecting a board, sprint, and refresh interval, and that the configuration is saved successfully.
This test case covers the configuration flow for the gadget.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and has access to the dashboard.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the Sprint Burndown Gadget configuration panel on the dashboard.
2. Select a board from the 'Board' dropdown (e.g., 'TPA board').
3. Select a sprint from the 'Sprint' dropdown (e.g., 'Next Sprint Due (auto)').
4. Select a refresh interval from the 'Refresh Interval' dropdown (e.g., 'Every 15 Minutes').
5. Click the 'Save' button.
Expected Result: The gadget is configured with the selected options and displays the corresponding burndown chart.

Title: Verify 'Assigned to Me' Issues Display
Description:
Ensure that the 'Assigned to Me' panel displays all issues currently assigned to the logged-in user.
This test case covers the visibility and accuracy of assigned issues.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and has at least one issue assigned.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard.
2. Locate the 'Assigned to Me' panel.
3. Observe the list of issues displayed.
Expected Result: All issues assigned to the user are displayed with correct issue keys and summaries (e.g., 'TPA-12 Ad-hoc execution for TPA-11').

Title: Verify Activity Streams Display
Description:
Ensure that the 'Activity Streams' panel displays recent activity in the Jira instance.
This test case covers the correct retrieval and display of activity logs.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and there is recent activity in the instance.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard.
2. Locate the 'Activity Streams' panel.
3. Observe the activity feed.
Expected Result: Recent activities are displayed in the panel. If no activity is found, a message such as 'No activity was found' is shown.

Title: Verify Gadget Search and Addition
Description:
Ensure that users can search for gadgets using the search bar and add them to the dashboard.
This test case covers searching for the 'Sprint Burndown Gadget' and adding it.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and on the dashboard page.
Test Steps:
1. Locate the 'Add a Gadget' panel.
2. Enter 'Burn' in the search bar.
3. Observe the search results for 'Sprint Burndown Gadget'.
4. Click the 'Add' button next to the gadget.
Expected Result: The 'Sprint Burndown Gadget' is added to the dashboard and available for configuration.

Title: Verify Introduction Panel Visibility
Description: Ensure that the 'Introduction' panel is visible on the dashboard and displays introductory information if available.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and on the dashboard page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard.
2. Locate the 'Introduction' panel.
Expected Result: The 'Introduction' panel is visible and displays relevant introductory information, or is empty if no content is set.
